Initializes a new instance of the error message with a default message indicating that the provided ma v2 account mode is invalid.
:::note
`InvalidModularAccountV2Mode` extends `BaseError`, see the docs for BaseError for all supported methods.
:::

## Import

```ts
import { InvalidModularAccountV2Mode } from "@aa-sdk/core";
```
